text: David Michael Carr (September 8, 1956 â€“ February 12, 2015) was an American columnist and author. He wrote the Media Equation column and covered culture for The New York Times. In 2014, he was named the Lack Professor of Media Studies at Boston University, a part-time position. Carr died on February 12, 2015 following a collapse in the New York Times newsroom at the age of 58.
